title: Object Detection using MobileNet-SSD
features: Built a real‑time object detection system using MobileNet‑SSD v3 and OpenCV, accurately identifying 80 COCO classes in images and video streams.
Implemented lightweight Python inference pipelines for image and video, enabling rapid deployment and visualized bounding‑box outputs.
Benchmarked detection latency below 50 ms per frame, demonstrating suitability for low‑latency applications such as surveillance and robotics.
